metadata.title: Live From Austin, TX (CD + DVD)
description: This 2-disc CD and DVD combo set is special for more than catching Billy Joe in his prime. It also features his now deceased guitar virtuoso son Eddy, as he thrills on his axe. Together you will see and hear 15 of Billy Joe's greatest hits. New West Records.
metadata.store: Billy Joe Shaver   Format: Audio CD
